content: details from *nomis vol 29 gloves and mittens* c 1988 women s two-tone crocheted gloves no 630 materials *bear brand or fleisher s ever-match sock and fingering* fingering yarn 1 oz each of 2 contrasting colors a and b to make gloves in solid color requires 2 ozs of same color steel crochet hook size 5 gauge 8 sts = 1 inch directions start on page 3 shown on front cover publishers bernhard ulmann co nomis yarn co
